name: Mark
seeking: Seeking JV partners in business services or professional development who can offer collaborative growth and referral opportunities. The profile explicitly notes active pursuit of strategic partnerships, indicating interest in co-marketing, referral deals, or bundled service arrangements. Partners serving a general small business or entrepreneur audience would be the strongest match.
what_you_do: Coach, recording artist, author, and entrepreneur who has set up philanthropic projects and organisations.
bio: Mark Desvaux is a coach, recording artist, author, and entrepreneur. He has set up a number of philanthropic projects, organisations and charities including Thankubank and the One Million Random Acts of Kindness.
business_focus: Coaching, creative work, and philanthropic initiatives.
signature_programs: Thankubank, One Million Random Acts of Kindness
